pages.text: $(#008cff)Undead Knights$() are slow, and inflict hunger when they attack.
$(#008cff)Aurorian Slimes$() are fast, though are pretty weak.

$(#8800ff)The Runestone Dungeon Keeper$() is the boss of $(#008cff)The Runestone Dungeon$(). He is a ranged boss that uses melee and knockback to hit you away when you get close.$(br2)It's recommended to bring a shield as he loves to use his arrows (especially when he's panicked).$(br2)When killed he will drop a $(#008cff)Keeper Amulet$() which can be used to access the next dungeon!
